subject: Upcoming Team Meeting and Agenda
body:
Hello Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to remind you of our upcoming team meeting scheduled for next Monday at 10 AM. Please find the agenda attached for your review.

Looking forward to our discussion.

Best regards,
John Doe

subject: Unauthorized Information Disclosure
body:
Dear Team,

It has come to our attention that certain project information was inadvertently shared with external parties without the proper authorization review. We need to address this situation promptly to mitigate any potential risks.

Please ensure you review our data handling policies to prevent future occurrences. Report any concerns or additional instances of information sharing that may not adhere to our protocols.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter.

Best,
[Your Name]
